summary.span: 封装等待对共享资源的独占访问的操作系统特定的对象。

span.span: Encapsulates operating system–specific objects that wait for exclusive access to shared resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类封装 Win32 同步句柄，用于表示在运行时允许多个等待操作的所有同步对象。The class encapsulates Win32 synchronization handles, and is used to represent all synchronization objects in the runtime that allow multiple wait operations. 与其他同步对象的等待句柄的比较，请参阅[同步基元概述](~/docs/standard/threading/overview-of-synchronization-primitives.md)。For a comparison of wait handles with other synchronization objects, see [Overview of Synchronization Primitives](~/docs/standard/threading/overview-of-synchronization-primitives.md). 类本身是抽象的。The class itself is abstract. 类派生自定义了一个信号机制，以指示获取或释放访问共享资源，但它们使用继承方法，若要在等待访问共享资源。Classes derived from define a signaling mechanism to indicate taking or releasing access to a shared resource, but they use the inherited methods to block while waiting for access to shared resources. 类派生自包括：The classes derived from include: - 类。The class. 请参阅[Mutex](~/docs/standard/threading/mutexes.md)。See [Mutexes](~/docs/standard/threading/mutexes.md). - 类和其派生的类，和。The class and its derived classes, and . 请参阅 [EventWaitHandle、AutoResetEvent、CountdownEvent、ManualResetEvent](~/docs/standard/threading/eventwaithandle-autoresetevent-countdownevent-manualresetevent.md)。See [EventWaitHandle, AutoResetEvent, CountdownEvent, ManualResetEvent](~/docs/standard/threading/eventwaithandle-autoresetevent-countdownevent-manualresetevent.md). - 类。The class. 请参阅[Semaphore 和 SemaphoreSlim](~/docs/standard/threading/semaphore-and-semaphoreslim.md)。See [Semaphore and SemaphoreSlim](~/docs/standard/threading/semaphore-and-semaphoreslim.md). 线程可以通过将阻止各个等待句柄上调用实例方法，由派生的类继承。Threads can block on an individual wait handle by calling the instance method , which is inherited by classes derived from . 派生的类的区别在于其线程关联。The derived classes of differ in their thread affinity. 事件等待句柄 (， ，和) 和信号量不具有线程关联; 任何线程都可以发送事件等待句柄或信号量。Event wait handles (, , and ) and semaphores do not have thread affinity; any thread can signal an event wait handle or semaphore. 互斥锁，但是，具有线程关联;拥有 mutex 的线程必须释放它，并且如果某个线程调用引发异常上不拥有互斥体的方法。Mutexes, on the other hand, do have thread affinity; the thread that owns a mutex must release it, and an exception is thrown if a thread calls the method on a mutex that it does not own. 因为类派生自，这些类可用于跨应用程序域边界同步线程的活动。Because the class derives from , these classes can be used to synchronize the activities of threads across application domain boundaries. 及其派生类，除了类包含静态方法，直到一个阻塞线程的数量，或者更多的同步对象收到信号...In addition to its derived classes, the class has a number of static methods that block a thread until one or more synchronization objects receive a signal.. 这些方法包括：These include: - 它允许线程发出信号一个等待句柄并立即等待另一个。, which allows a thread to signal one wait handle and immediately wait on another. - 它允许一个线程等待，直到所有等待句柄数组中的都接收信号。, which allows a thread to wait until all the wait handles in an array receive a signal. - 它允许一个线程等待，直到任一一组指定的等待句柄发送信号。, which allows a thread to wait until any one of a specified set of wait handles has been signaled . 这些方法的重载提供超时间隔后，将放弃等待，并输入允许使用同步上下文的其他线程在等待之前退出同步上下文的机会。The overloads of these methods provide timeout intervals for abandoning the wait, and the opportunity to exit a synchronization context before entering the wait, allowing other threads to use the synchronization context. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 完成后使用的类型或从其派生的类型的操作后，您应释放它直接或间接。When you have finished using the type or a type derived from it, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 实现模式。 implements the pattern. 请参阅[释放模式](~/docs/standard/design-guidelines/dispose-pattern.md)。See [Dispose Pattern](~/docs/standard/design-guidelines/dispose-pattern.md). 派生自，使用属性来存储你的本机句柄操作系统句柄。When you derive from , use the property to store your native handle operating system handle. 不需要重写受保护方法除非你使用其他非托管的资源。You do not need to override the protected method unless you use additional unmanaged resources. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在两个线程可以执行后台任务，同时主线程等待任务完成使用静态并方法的类。The following code example shows how two threads can do background tasks while the Main thread waits for the tasks to complete using the static and methods of the class. [!code-cpp[WaitHandle#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/WaitHandle/cpp/WaitHandle.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WaitHandle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/WaitHandle/CS/WaitHandle.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WaitHandle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/WaitHandle/VB/WaitHandle.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是公共实现方法类和其派生的类。This method is the public implementation of the method for the class and its derived classes. 它提供了一种标准的实现，调用`Dispose(Boolean)`重载，并`true`自变量，然后调用方法。It provides a standard implementation that calls the `Dispose(Boolean)` overload with a `true` argument and then calls the method. 调用此方法来释放由的实例占用的所有资源`WaitHandle`或派生的类。Call this method to release all resources held by an instance of `WaitHandle` or a derived class. 调用此方法后，对当前实例的引用会导致未定义的行为。Once this method is called, references to the current instance cause undefined behavior. > [!NOTE] > 始终调用或发布到最后一个引用之前。Always call or before you release your last reference to the . 否则，不会释放它所使用的资源。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不能保证才能成为原子性。This operation is not guaranteed to be atomic. 当前线程发出信号后`toSignal`但在等待之前`toWaitOn`，在另一个处理器运行的线程可能会发出信号`toWaitOn`或在其上等待。After the current thread signals `toSignal` but before it waits on `toWaitOn`, a thread that is running on another processor might signal `toWaitOn` or wait on it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法重载来允许主线程发出信号已阻塞的线程并然后等待，直到线程完成任务。The following code example uses the method overload to allow the main thread to signal a blocked thread and then wait until the thread finishes a task. 该示例启动五个线程时，允许其上阻止使用创建标志，然后一个线程一次时释放用户按下 ENTER 键。The example starts five threads, allows them to block on an created with the flag, and then releases one thread each time the user presses the ENTER key. 该示例然后另外五个线程并释放所有使用使用创建标志。The example then queues another five threads and releases them all using an created with the flag. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不能保证才能成为原子性。This operation is not guaranteed to be atomic. 当前线程发出信号后`toSignal`但在等待之前`toWaitOn`，在另一个处理器运行的线程可能会发出信号`toWaitOn`或在其上等待。After the current thread signals `toSignal` but before it waits on `toWaitOn`, a thread that is running on another processor might signal `toWaitOn` or wait on it. 如果`millisecondsTimeout`为零，该方法不会阻止。If `millisecondsTimeout` is zero, the method does not block. 测试的状态`toWaitOn`并立即返回。It tests the state of the `toWaitOn` and returns immediately. ## 在退出上下文的说明Notes on Exiting the Context `exitContext`参数无任何效果，除非从非默认托管上下文中调用方法。The `exitContext` parameter has no effect unless the method is called from inside a nondefault managed context. 如果你的线程是派生自的类的实例的调用内部发生这种情况。This can happen if your thread is inside a call to an instance of a class derived from . 即使当前正在执行一种方法不是派生的类上，例如，可以在非默认上下文中是如果是当前的应用程序域中的堆栈上。Even if you are currently executing a method on a class that does not derive from , like , you can be in a nondefault context if a is on your stack in the current application domain. 时在非默认上下文中执行代码时，指定`true`有关`exitContext`会导致线程退出非默认托管的上下文 (即，转换到默认上下文) 执行前方法。When your code is executing in a nondefault context, specifying `true` for `exitContext` causes the thread to exit the nondefault managed context (that is, to transition to the default context) before executing the method. 线程在调用后返回到原始的非默认上下文方法完成。The thread returns to the original nondefault context after the call to the method completes. 在上下文绑定类时这很有用。This can be useful when the context-bound class has . 在这种情况下，所有调用的类的成员将自动都同步，并同步域是为类代码的整个正文。In that case, all calls to members of the class are automatically synchronized, and the synchronization domain is the entire body of code for the class. 如果某个成员的调用堆栈中的代码将调用方法，并指定`true`为`exitContext`，在线程退出同步域，这样在调用对象的任何成员以继续操作被阻止的线程。If code in the call stack of a member calls the method and specifies `true` for `exitContext`, the thread exits the synchronization domain, allowing a thread that is blocked on a call to any member of the object to proceed. 当方法返回时，调用线程必须等待以重新输入同步域。When the method returns, the thread that made the call must wait to reenter the synchronization domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不能保证才能成为原子性。This operation is not guaranteed to be atomic. 当前线程发出信号后`toSignal`但在等待之前`toWaitOn`，在另一个处理器运行的线程可能会发出信号`toWaitOn`或在其上等待。After the current thread signals `toSignal` but before it waits on `toWaitOn`, a thread that is running on another processor might signal `toWaitOn` or wait on it. 最大值`timeout`是。The maximum value for `timeout` is . 如果`timeout`为零，该方法不会阻止。If `timeout` is zero, the method does not block. 测试的状态`toWaitOn`并立即返回。It tests the state of the `toWaitOn` and returns immediately. ## 在退出上下文的说明Notes on Exiting the Context `exitContext`参数无任何效果，除非从非默认托管上下文中调用方法。The `exitContext` parameter has no effect unless the method is called from inside a nondefault managed context. 如果你的线程是派生自的类的实例的调用内部发生这种情况。This can happen if your thread is inside a call to an instance of a class derived from . 即使当前正在执行一种方法不是派生的类上，例如，可以在非默认上下文中是如果是当前的应用程序域中的堆栈上。Even if you are currently executing a method on a class that does not derive from , like , you can be in a nondefault context if a is on your stack in the current application domain. 时在非默认上下文中执行代码时，指定`true`有关`exitContext`会导致线程退出非默认托管的上下文 (即，转换到默认上下文) 执行前方法。When your code is executing in a nondefault context, specifying `true` for `exitContext` causes the thread to exit the nondefault managed context (that is, to transition to the default context) before executing the method. 线程在调用后返回到原始的非默认上下文方法完成。The thread returns to the original nondefault context after the call to the method completes. 在上下文绑定类时这很有用。This can be useful when the context-bound class has . 在这种情况下，所有调用的类的成员将自动都同步，并同步域是为类代码的整个正文。In that case, all calls to members of the class are automatically synchronized, and the synchronization domain is the entire body of code for the class. 如果某个成员的调用堆栈中的代码将调用方法，并指定`true`为`exitContext`，在线程退出同步域，这样在调用对象的任何成员以继续操作被阻止的线程。If code in the call stack of a member calls the method and specifies `true` for `exitContext`, the thread exits the synchronization domain, allowing a thread that is blocked on a call to any member of the object to proceed. 当方法返回时，调用线程必须等待以重新输入同步域。When the method returns, the thread that made the call must wait to reenter the synchronization domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是.NET Framework 2.0 版中的新增功能。 is new in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 在上一版本中，方法将返回`true`时放弃的互斥体。In previous versions, the method returns `true` when a mutex is abandoned. 放弃的 mutex 通常表明存在严重的编码错误。An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious coding error. 在系统范围的情况下它可能指示，已突然终止应用程序 （例如，通过使用 Windows 任务管理器）。In the case of a system-wide mutex, it might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager). 该异常包含有关调试的有用信息。The exception contains information useful for debugging. 方法返回时都收到信号的句柄。The method returns when all the handles are signaled. 在某些实现中，如果传递的 64 个以上的句柄，引发。On some implementations, if more than 64 handles are passed, a is thrown. 如果数组包含重复项，调用将失败。If the array contains duplicates, the call fails with a . > [!NOTE] > 方法不支持在具有的线程上。The method is not supported on threads that have . 调用此方法重载是等效于调用方法重载并指定-1 (或) 用于`millisecondsTimeout`并`true`为`exitContext`。Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying -1 (or ) for `millisecondsTimeout` and `true` for `exitContext`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用线程池以异步方式创建和写入的文件组。The following code example shows how to use the thread pool to asynchronously create and write to a group of files. 完成后，每个写入操作排队作为工作项和信号。Each write operation is queued as a work item and signals when it is finished. 主线程等待发出信号的所有项，然后退出。The main thread waits for all the items to signal and then exits. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`millisecondsTimeout`为零，该方法不会阻止。If `millisecondsTimeout` is zero, the method does not block. 它测试等待句柄的状态并立即返回。It tests the state of the wait handles and returns immediately. 是.NET Framework 2.0 版中的新增功能。 is new in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 在上一版本中，方法将返回`true`时放弃的互斥体。In previous versions, the method returns `true` when a mutex is abandoned. 放弃的 mutex 通常表明存在严重的编码错误。An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious coding error. 在系统范围的情况下它可能指示，已突然终止应用程序 （例如，通过使用 Windows 任务管理器）。In the case of a system-wide mutex, it might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager). 该异常包含有关调试的有用信息。The exception contains information useful for debugging. 方法返回时，等待将终止，这意味着所有句柄都已终止或出现超时。The method returns when the wait terminates, which means either when all the handles are signaled or when time-out occurs. 在某些实现中，如果传递的 64 个以上的句柄，引发。On some implementations, if more than 64 handles are passed, a is thrown. 如果数组中有重复项，调用将失败。If there are duplicates in the array, the call fails with a . > [!NOTE] > 方法不支持在具有的线程上。The method is not supported on threads that have . ## 在退出上下文的说明Notes on Exiting the Context `exitContext`参数无任何效果，除非从非默认托管上下文中调用方法。The `exitContext` parameter has no effect unless the method is called from inside a nondefault managed context. 如果你的线程是派生自的类的实例的调用内部发生这种情况。This can happen if your thread is inside a call to an instance of a class derived from . 即使当前正在执行一种方法不派生自的类上，例如，可以在非默认上下文中是如果是当前的应用程序域中的堆栈上。Even if you are currently executing a method on a class that is not derived from , like , you can be in a nondefault context if a is on your stack in the current application domain. 时在非默认上下文中执行代码时，指定`true`有关`exitContext`会导致线程退出非默认托管的上下文 (即，转换到默认上下文) 执行前方法。When your code is executing in a nondefault context, specifying `true` for `exitContext` causes the thread to exit the nondefault managed context (that is, to transition to the default context) before executing the method. 线程在调用后返回到原始的非默认上下文方法完成。The thread returns to the original nondefault context after the call to the method completes. 在上下文绑定类时这很有用属性。This can be useful when the context-bound class has the attribute. 在这种情况下，所有调用的类的成员将自动都同步，并同步域是为类代码的整个正文。In that case, all calls to members of the class are automatically synchronized, and the synchronization domain is the entire body of code for the class. 如果某个成员的调用堆栈中的代码将调用方法，并指定`true`为`exitContext`，在线程退出同步域，这样在调用对象的任何成员以继续操作被阻止的线程。If code in the call stack of a member calls the method and specifies `true` for `exitContext`, the thread exits the synchronization domain, allowing a thread that is blocked on a call to any member of the object to proceed. 当方法返回时，调用线程必须等待以重新输入同步域。When the method returns, the thread that made the call must wait to reenter the synchronization domain. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用线程池以异步方式创建和写入的文件组。The following code example shows how to use the thread pool to asynchronously create and write to a group of files. 完成后，每个写入操作排队作为工作项和信号。Each write operation is queued as a work item and signals when it is finished. 主线程等待发出信号的所有项，然后退出。The main thread waits for all the items to signal and then exits. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll2/CPP/source2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll2/CS/source2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll2/VB/source2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是.NET Framework 2.0 版中的新增功能。 is new in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 在上一版本中，方法将返回`true`如果等待完成，因为已放弃的互斥体。In previous versions, the method returns `true` if the wait completes because a mutex is abandoned. 放弃的 mutex 通常表明存在严重的编码错误。An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious coding error. 在系统范围的情况下它可能指示，已突然终止应用程序 （例如，通过使用 Windows 任务管理器）。In the case of a system-wide mutex, it might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager). 该异常包含有关调试的有用信息。The exception contains information useful for debugging. 方法会抛出仅等待完成由于已放弃的互斥体。The method throws an only when the wait completes because of an abandoned mutex. 如果`waitHandles`包含具有较低的索引号比放弃的互斥体，释放的互斥体方法正常完成且不会引发异常。If `waitHandles` contains a released mutex with a lower index number than the abandoned mutex, the method completes normally and the exception is not thrown. > [!NOTE] > 在版本的.NET Framework 版本 2.0 中，如果一个线程退出或中止，且不显式地释放低于，并且`Mutex`中位于索引 0 （零）`WaitAny`上另一个线程，返回的索引数组`WaitAny`是而不是 0 128。In versions of the .NET Framework earlier than version 2.0, if a thread exits or aborts without explicitly releasing a , and that `Mutex` is at index 0 (zero) in a `WaitAny` array on another thread, the index returned by `WaitAny` is 128 instead of 0. 此方法返回时任何句柄发出信号。This method returns when any handle is signaled. 如果多个对象在调用期间将被发送信号，则返回值是对象的具有所有终止的对象的最小索引值终止的数组索引。If more than one object becomes signaled during the call, the return value is the array index of the signaled object with the smallest index value of all the signaled objects. 在某些实现中，如果多个传递的句柄 64，引发。On some implementations, if more that 64 handles are passed, a is thrown. 调用此方法重载是等效于调用方法重载并指定-1 (或) 用于`millisecondsTimeout`并`true`为`exitContext`。Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying -1 (or ) for `millisecondsTimeout` and `true` for `exitContext`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法。The following code example demonstrates calling the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`timeout`为零，该方法不会阻止。If `timeout` is zero, the method does not block. 它测试等待句柄的状态并立即返回。It tests the state of the wait handles and returns immediately. 方法会抛出仅等待完成由于已放弃的互斥体。The method throws an only when the wait completes because of an abandoned mutex. 如果`waitHandles`包含具有较低的索引号比放弃的互斥体，释放的互斥体方法正常完成且不会引发异常。If `waitHandles` contains a released mutex with a lower index number than the abandoned mutex, the method completes normally and the exception is not thrown. 此方法返回时，等待将终止，任何句柄发出信号时或发生超时。This method returns when the wait terminates, either when any of the handles are signaled or when a time-out occurs. 如果多个对象在调用期间将被发送信号，则返回值是对象的具有所有终止的对象的最小索引值终止的数组索引。If more than one object becomes signaled during the call, the return value is the array index of the signaled object with the smallest index value of all the signaled objects. 在某些实现中，如果多个传递的句柄 64，引发。On some implementations, if more that 64 handles are passed, a is thrown. 最大值`timeout`是。The maximum value for `timeout` is . 调用此方法的重载相当于调用重载并指定`false`为`exitContext`。Calling this method overload is the same as calling the overload and specifying `false` for `exitContext`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`millisecondsTimeout`为零，该方法不会阻止。If `millisecondsTimeout` is zero, the method does not block. 它测试等待句柄的状态并立即返回。It tests the state of the wait handles and returns immediately. 是.NET Framework 2.0 版中的新增功能。 is new in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 在上一版本中，方法将返回`true`如果等待完成，因为已放弃的互斥体。In previous versions, the method returns `true` if the wait completes because a mutex is abandoned. 放弃的 mutex 通常表明存在严重的编码错误。An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious coding error. 在系统范围的情况下它可能指示，已突然终止应用程序 （例如，通过使用 Windows 任务管理器）。In the case of a system-wide mutex, it might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager). 该异常包含有关调试的有用信息。The exception contains information useful for debugging. 方法会抛出仅等待完成由于已放弃的互斥体。The method throws an only when the wait completes because of an abandoned mutex. 如果`waitHandles`包含具有较低的索引号比放弃的互斥体，释放的互斥体方法正常完成且不会引发异常。If `waitHandles` contains a released mutex with a lower index number than the abandoned mutex, the method completes normally and the exception is not thrown. > [!NOTE] > 在版本的.NET Framework 版本 2.0 中，如果一个线程退出或中止，且不显式地释放低于，并且`Mutex`中位于索引 0 （零）`WaitAny`上另一个线程，返回的索引数组`WaitAny`是而不是 0 128。In versions of the .NET Framework earlier than version 2.0, if a thread exits or aborts without explicitly releasing a , and that `Mutex` is at index 0 (zero) in a `WaitAny` array on another thread, the index returned by `WaitAny` is 128 instead of 0. 此方法返回时，等待将终止，任何句柄发出信号或超时发生时。This method returns when the wait terminates, either when any of the handles are signaled or when a timeout occurs. 如果多个对象在调用期间将被发送信号，则返回值是对象的具有所有终止的对象的最小索引值终止的数组索引。If more than one object becomes signaled during the call, the return value is the array index of the signaled object with the smallest index value of all the signaled objects. 在某些实现中，如果多个传递的句柄 64，引发。On some implementations, if more that 64 handles are passed, a is thrown. ## 在退出上下文的说明Notes on Exiting the Context `exitContext`参数无任何效果，除非从非默认托管上下文中调用方法。The `exitContext` parameter has no effect unless the method is called from inside a nondefault managed context. 如果你的线程是派生自的类的实例的调用内部发生这种情况。This can happen if your thread is inside a call to an instance of a class derived from . 即使当前正在执行一种方法不是派生的类上，例如，可以在非默认上下文中是如果是当前的应用程序域中的堆栈上。Even if you are currently executing a method on a class that does not derive from , like , you can be in a nondefault context if a is on your stack in the current application domain. 时在非默认上下文中执行代码时，指定`true`有关`exitContext`会导致线程退出非默认托管的上下文 (即，转换到默认上下文) 执行前方法。When your code is executing in a nondefault context, specifying `true` for `exitContext` causes the thread to exit the nondefault managed context (that is, to transition to the default context) before executing the method. 线程在调用后返回到原始的非默认上下文方法完成。The thread returns to the original nondefault context after the call to the method completes. 在上下文绑定类时这很有用。This can be useful when the context-bound class has . 在这种情况下，所有调用的类的成员将自动都同步，并同步域是为类代码的整个正文。In that case, all calls to members of the class are automatically synchronized, and the synchronization domain is the entire body of code for the class. 如果某个成员的调用堆栈中的代码将调用方法，并指定`true`为`exitContext`，在线程退出同步域，这样在调用对象的任何成员以继续操作被阻止的线程。If code in the call stack of a member calls the method and specifies `true` for `exitContext`, the thread exits the synchronization domain, allowing a thread that is blocked on a call to any member of the object to proceed. 当方法返回时，调用线程必须等待以重新输入同步域。When the method returns, the thread that made the call must wait to reenter the synchronization domain. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用线程池来同时搜索多个磁盘上的文件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the thread pool to simultaneously search for a file on multiple disks. 有关空间注意事项，搜索每个磁盘的根目录。For space considerations, only the root directory of each disk is searched. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是.NET Framework 2.0 版中的新增功能。 is new in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 在上一版本中，方法将返回`true`时放弃的互斥体。In previous versions, the method returns `true` when a mutex is abandoned. 放弃的 mutex 通常表明存在严重的编码错误。An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious coding error. 在系统范围的情况下它可能指示，已突然终止应用程序 （例如，通过使用 Windows 任务管理器）。In the case of a system-wide mutex, it might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager). 该异常包含有关调试的有用信息。The exception contains information useful for debugging. 此方法进行阻止，直到当前实例无限期的调用方收到信号。The caller of this method blocks indefinitely until the current instance receives a signal. 使用此方法进行阻止，直至从另一个线程收到信号，例如则会生成异步操作完成时。Use this method to block until a receives a signal from another thread, such as is generated when an asynchronous operation completes. 有关详细信息，请参阅接口。For more information, see the interface. 调用此方法重载是等效于调用方法重载并指定-1 或第一个参数和`false`为第二个参数。Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying -1 or for the first parameter and `false` for the second parameter. 重写此方法以自定义派生类的行为。Override this method to customize the behavior of derived classes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用等待句柄以防止进程终止等待后台线程完成执行时。The following code example shows how to use a wait handle to keep a process from terminating while it waits for a background thread to finish executing. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`millisecondsTimeout`为零，该方法不会阻止。If `millisecondsTimeout` is zero, the method does not block. 它测试等待句柄的状态并立即返回。It tests the state of the wait handle and returns immediately. 是.NET Framework 2.0 版中的新增功能。 is new in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 在上一版本中，方法将返回`true`时放弃的互斥体。In previous versions, the method returns `true` when a mutex is abandoned. 放弃的 mutex 通常表明存在严重的编码错误。An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious coding error. 在系统范围的情况下它可能指示，已突然终止应用程序 （例如，通过使用 Windows 任务管理器）。In the case of a system-wide mutex, it might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager). 该异常包含有关调试的有用信息。The exception contains information useful for debugging. 此方法受到阻止，直到当前实例收到信号或超时的调用方会发生。The caller of this method blocks until the current instance receives a signal or a time-out occurs. 使用此方法进行阻止，直至从另一个线程收到信号，例如则会生成异步操作完成时。Use this method to block until a receives a signal from another thread, such as is generated when an asynchronous operation completes. 有关详细信息，请参阅接口。For more information, see the interface. 重写此方法以自定义派生类的行为。Override this method to customize the behavior of derived classes. ## 在退出上下文的说明Notes on Exiting the Context `exitContext`参数无任何效果，除非从非默认托管上下文中调用方法。The `exitContext` parameter has no effect unless the method is called from inside a nondefault managed context. 如果你的线程是派生自的类的实例的调用内部发生这种情况。This can happen if your thread is inside a call to an instance of a class derived from . 即使当前正在执行一种方法不是派生的类上，例如，可以在非默认上下文中是如果是当前的应用程序域中的堆栈上。Even if you are currently executing a method on a class that does not derive from , like , you can be in a nondefault context if a is on your stack in the current application domain. 时在非默认上下文中执行代码时，指定`true`有关`exitContext`会导致线程退出非默认托管的上下文 (即，转换到默认上下文) 执行前方法。When your code is executing in a nondefault context, specifying `true` for `exitContext` causes the thread to exit the nondefault managed context (that is, to transition to the default context) before executing the method. 线程在调用后返回到原始的非默认上下文方法完成。The thread returns to the original nondefault context after the call to the method completes. 在上下文绑定类时这很有用。This can be useful when the context-bound class has . 在这种情况下，所有调用的类的成员将自动都同步，并同步域是为类代码的整个正文。In that case, all calls to members of the class are automatically synchronized, and the synchronization domain is the entire body of code for the class. 如果某个成员的调用堆栈中的代码将调用方法，并指定`true`为`exitContext`，在线程退出同步域，这样在调用对象的任何成员以继续操作被阻止的线程。If code in the call stack of a member calls the method and specifies `true` for `exitContext`, the thread exits the synchronization domain, allowing a thread that is blocked on a call to any member of the object to proceed. 当方法返回时，调用线程必须等待以重新输入同步域。When the method returns, the thread that made the call must wait to reenter the synchronization domain. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将方法重载的行为与在一个域中同步调用时。The following example shows how the method overload behaves when it is called within a synchronization domain. 首先的线程在等待`exitContext`设置为`false`并阻止，直到等待超时过期。First, a thread waits with `exitContext` set to `false` and blocks until the wait timeout expires. 第二个线程执行后的第一个线程终止，并使用在等待`exitContext`设置为`true`。A second thread executes after the first thread terminates and waits with `exitContext` set to `true`. 此第二个线程的等待句柄发送信号的调用未被阻止，并在线程等待超时前完成。The call to signal the wait handle for this second thread is not blocked, and the thread completes before the wait timeout.
